bibl.title: Gospel Truth? New Light on Jesus and the Gospels.
bibl.note: Concerne notamment P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)).
bibl.seg: STANTON Graham, Gospel Truth? New Light on Jesus and the Gospels.
London, Harper Collins, 1995, 8°, viii-215 pp. ISBN 0-00-627963-5. £14.99.
Concerne notamment P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)).
C.R. par J.K. Elliott, NT 38 (1996) p. 399.
